clinical_study.brief_title: Feasibility of mindBEAGLE in Disorders of Consciousness or Locked-In Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility Study of the mindBEAGLE Device in Patients With Disorders of Consciousness or Locked-In Syndrome

primary_outcome.measure: Behavioral Diagnosis of Level of Consciousness (LoC)
primary_outcome.description: LoC will be defined using the Coma Recovery Scale-Revised behavioral evaluation (score range 0-23)

secondary_outcome.description: functional MRI biomarkers of conscious awareness (+ or - activation during auditory stimulus)
resting EEG biomarkers of conscious awareness (power in delta, theta, and alpha frequency bands)

arm_group.description: Application of bedside, EEG-based mindBEAGLE Brain-Computer Interface

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age>18
- Diagnosis of coma
- Vegetative state
- Minimally conscious state
- Confusional state
- Locked-in state
